articles.description: Follow build up & live actions from nine matches including Arsenal v Kairat, Liverpool v Qarabağ, Manchester City v Galatasaray, Napoli v Chelsea and Paris Saint-Germain v Newcastle.
articles.title: Champions League LIVE: Follow build up & live actions from nine matches including Arsenal v Kairat, Liverpool v Qarabağ, Manchester City v Galatasaray, Napoli v Chelsea and Paris Saint-Germain v Newcastle United

articles.description: Goalkeeper Anatoliy Trubin scores a stunning 98th-minute goal to send Jose Mourinho's Benfica into the Champions League play-offs after beating Real Madrid.
articles.title: Benfica 4-2 Real Madrid: Goalkeeper Anatoliy Trubin's 98th-minute header puts Jose Mourinho's side into play-offs

articles.description: Kai Havertz scores on his first start for nearly a year as Arsenal complete a flawless league phase campaign in the Champions League.
articles.title: Arsenal 3-2 Kairat Almaty: Gunners keep 100% record in Champions League

articles.description: Manchester City make light work of Galatasaray as they secure a spot in the last 16 of the Champions League.
articles.title: Manchester City beat Galatasaray 2-0 to secure last-16 spot

articles.description: Barcelona came from behind to beat Copenhagen and secure direct progression to the last 16 of the Champions League.
articles.title: Barcelona 4-1 Copenhagen: Barcelona secure Champions League progress

articles.description: Under-pressure Tottenham boss Thomas Frank guides his side to an important victory at Eintracht Frankfurt to secure a place in the Champions League last 16.
articles.title: Eintracht Frankfurt 0-2 Tottenham: Thomas Frank's side seal last-16 Champions League spot

articles.description: US President Donald Trump says it is "ridiculous" that Bill Belichick - widely considered the greatest NFL coach ever - has reportedly been denied first-ballot induction into the Pro Football Hall of Fame.
articles.title: Donald Trump calls Bill Belichick Hall of Fame exclusion 'ridiculous'

articles.description: Mohamed Salah scores for the first time since November as Liverpool thrash Qarabag to cruise into the last 16 of the Champions League.
articles.title: Liverpool 6-0 Qarabag: Mohamed Salah scores as Liverpool cruise into Champions League last 16

articles.description: Two second-half goals from Joao Pedro see Chelsea come from behind to knock Napoli out of the Champions League and finish in the top eight.
articles.title: Joao Pedro gives Chelsea top-eight finish as Napoli go out

articles.description: Joe Willock stepped up as spirited Newcastle United came from behind to draw against holders Paris St-Germain in the Champions League.
articles.title: PSG 1-1 Newcastle: Willock steps up as visitors come from behind to draw
